description:
The iconic Marcie day bag combines a distinct 70s spirit with a romantic and feminine touch. This mini version packs all the signature features of the Marcie family into a compact companion for the practical Chloé girl.

The harmonious mix of clean lines and curved shapes is typical of the Maison's play on both masculine and feminine notes. The luxe supple leather and contoured design are decorated by curved X buckles and saddle stitches for chic and casual appeal. 

The mini Marcie bag can be worn over-shoulder or cross-body.

description:
The Maison’s iconic Marcie leather purse blends a romantic and feminine esthetic with a 70s folk spirit. Clean lines and a contoured design are paired with supple leather and slouchy styling for an effortlessly sensual effect.

Decorative saddle stitching, hand-wrapped leather handles and hanging leather strips add a folkloric touch, while the signature X handle attachments bring refinement and contrast to the Marcie handbag’s laid-back appeal.

Voluminous and practical, Marcie works for any occasion. The detachable strap allows for casual, cross-body styling.

Item code: CHC20US153C76211
description:
Crafted from an elegant combination of braided smooth calfskin, suede and grained calfskin, the Tess small purse reveals a sophisticated round silhouette anchored in the Maison's DNA. The striking front loop showcases Chloé's "O" signature, while the braided handle showcases the Maison's leather craftsmanship.

Tess has a roomy interior making it ideal for day-to-day use. Double straps (one short and one long) are secured by feminine hooks in golden and silver tones. A bold leather band contours the handbag's base to highlight the round shape.
